PrecisAmendment to the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS Schedule No. 245 giving the manufacturers of school buses the option of installing rearward facing seats so as to provide the benefits identified by the research performed by Transport Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1991-0593 Publication Date: 1991-11-06
Attachments
precis:
Amendment to the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS Schedule No. 245 giving
the manufacturers of school buses the option of installing rearward facing
seats so as to provide the benefits identified by the research performed
by Transport Canada.
